title: 服务器崩溃，急救！！！
author: 薛乐仁
txt_content:
报错：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// You should try our sister game, Minceraft!
Time: 3/27/16 1:06 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: net.minecraft.block.Block.func_149694_d(Lnet/minecraft/world/World;III)Lnet/minecraft/item/Item;

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: DraconicEvolution{0.9.5-Beta} [Draconic Evolution] (龙之研究-Mod-1.7.10.jar) 无法加载部分工具导致崩溃
好像是一个mod物品崩溃，貌似是DraconicPickaxe ，翻译是龙镐 ，如果真有这个东西，删除该mod或禁用试试

replies.author: Littleorange
replies.txt_content:
删了和风mod+删地图
不删地图会卡区块

replies.author: 薛乐仁
replies.txt_content:
Littleorange 发表于 2016-3-27 19:38
